intro: You also see the bulge of her overfull bladder.
girlname: You get in your car and drive over to {0}'s place.
{0} whispers shyly: I've been been bursting my bladder waiting for you.
{0} whispers shyly: I'm so glad you're finally here - I've really got to pee!
You're at {0}'s place to pick her up.
girltalk: {0}Oh! You're early! I wasn't expecting you to show up on time!
{0}I know you asked me to wait, but I couldn't hold it - I had to pee.
{0}I waited to pee just like you asked
